author: Football Italia staff
title: Serie A Seasons: Inter 2001-02
description: It was a three-way Scudetto race going into the final game of the season, as Inter, Juventus and Roma were within reach of the title on May 5, 2002…
content:
Words: Livio Caferoglu
The 2001-02 season was supposed to mark a turning point in Inter’s fortunes, where they were supposed to right their wrongs of the past few years. The previous campaign saw them finish fifth in Serie A, 26 points behind Scudetto winner… [+11245 chars]
